name: ARHitTestResult.ResultType
desc: Possible types for specifying a hit-test search, or for the result of a hit-test search.

items.name: static var featurePoint: ARHitTestResult.ResultType
items.desc: A point on a surface detected by ARKit, but not part of any detected planes.

items.name: static var estimatedHorizontalPlane: ARHitTestResult.ResultType
items.desc: A point on a real-world planar surface detected during the search, whose orientation is perpendicular to gravity.

items.name: static var estimatedVerticalPlane: ARHitTestResult.ResultType
items.desc: A point on a real-world planar surface detected during the search, whose orientation is parallel to gravity.

items.name: static var existingPlane: ARHitTestResult.ResultType
items.desc: A point on a real-world plane (already detected with the planeDetection option), without considering the plane's size.

items.name: static var existingPlaneUsingExtent: ARHitTestResult.ResultType
items.desc: A point on a real-world plane (already detected with the planeDetection option), respecting the plane's estimated size.

items.name: static var existingPlaneUsingGeometry: ARHitTestResult.ResultType
items.desc: A point on a real-world plane (already detected with the planeDetection option), respecting the plane's estimated size and shape.
